title: About

description1.part1: Hello! My name is Brian and I'm currently a software engineer at DRW. I hold a
description1.part2: after graduating from McGill University in 2023. I love learning new ways to build solutions in order to solve problems both creatively and efficiently.

description2: My interests include AI/ML and cybersecurity, and I strive to incorporate these themes in my personal projects. In my spare time, I enjoy both participating in hackathons as well as tutoring others on the fundamentals of programming.
